text:
ISBN-13: 9781880685358.
ISBN-10: 1880685353.
Title: Harrington on Hold 'em.
Subtitle: Expert Strategy for No-Limit Tournaments; Volume II: the Endgame.
Authors: Dan Harrington;Bill Robertie.
Categories: Games & Activities.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=u8y_9XdJaEMC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&edge=curl&source=gbs_api.
Description: Provides poker strategies for every phase of tournament play, covering the early phase where the stakes are small to later tactics such as bluffing, flops, scare cards, playing shorthanded, loose games, and endgame play..
Published Year: 2005.
